title: Is the Darius rework coming within 3 patches?
body: Scruffy said it was coming very soon so I was wondering if it's within 3 patches.

replies.body: It's very likely it will.

Meddler are there any plans for Zed compensation buffs now that he is absolutely useless in competitive play? When was the last time a champion was picked in the LCS and the player didn't use his ultimate even once, because to do so, would be suicide?

You guys overnerfed Zed and you know it, you are not stupid, the question is, are you going to wait for worlds until you buff him and make him viable, like you did last year, or will you buff him soon? We all know how loved Zed is by people watching competitive games in LCS/Worlds, those flashy plays are more entertaining then 20m afk farming mages/varus mid.

Cheers, hope you have the guts and decency to answer.

Now he is a useless trash tier pick in competitive play, this is a fact.

Summoner Spell, early 1250g, first 3000g.. that's a huge expense to pay to deal with a single champion, he's not unplayable, those are counter play items but not directed at Zed, as it was noted before he's a champion that used to be able to towerdive-kill others without taking a single tower shot.. THAT kind of mobility is too much and it had to be tuned down.

He's still a great split-pusher and Assassin, just riskier than before, his damage didn't drop nor did his 'outplay' potential.

People left WoW because Ghostcrawler ruined the game balance in PvP and PvE, they changed the core of an MMORPG, they took the RP out of it when they made all classes the same, no more unique roles, they made leveling easier so the world became smaller, no longer a world you could get lost in, pair that with flying mounts and massive portals/teleports, dungeon finder, raid finder and many more problems. Vanilla and TBC were amazing, WOTLK was good, but it started the downfall of WoW. I quit after WotlK.

I doubt this will happen to LoL, because its hard to change to core game play of LoL. LoL would die if they would take away items, or CS'ing, or jungling or brushes/wards, as long as the core stays the same, game will go on, WoW was destroyed because the core of the game was changed.
It's so destroyed that it still has millions upon millions of players on it yet.
